subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: all the meditation colors
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
I went to a medium development circle a couple times last year, and the
visions received were similar to your cross.

 F-S

On Sat, Oct 2, 2010 at 1:04 AM, Adriana Jones <adrianamjones@...>wrote:

>
>
> Funny you should say that because only a few days ago I myself read about
> doing this and its ability to open up your psychic side. I've only tried it
> a little bit, but you mentioning it again here will reinforce it and I will
> try it more now. The first time I ever noticed my mind being able to do that
> I was over three years ago in an almost pitch black room at night in bed,
> and all of sudden I saw a fuzzy white cross floating near the ceiling, and I
> was like "Whoa, did my mind just do that?" And I'm thankful for the fact
> that it was a white cross and no other thing, because I think anything else
> would have completely freaked me out. The fact that it was a white cross
> kept me calm about it. Later I tried to recreate the same white cross by
> thinking about it really hard, and I was able to do so but not as distinctly
> as when it "just came". Recently I've been able to think about a couple
> shapes and colors and actually make them show up in my mental visual field
> (eyes closed/dark room). Freaking fascinating.
>
> --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com <EVP-ITC%40yahoogroups.com>, Frank Sumption
> <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:
> >
> > Visualize red-oragnge-yellow-green-blue-violet. You have to be able to
> > actually see the colors in the minds eye. I like to go out
> > --non-physically-- and look at stuff like this to see the colors, it
> > enhances psychic ability.
> >
> > F-S
> >
>
> 
>
